education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Indeed Job Miner
projects.description: Leveraged web scraping to extract job postings from Indeed, utilizing Python library BeautifulSoup for efficient data retrieval. Employed Natural Language Processing (NLP) to preprocess the scraped data, NLTK (Natural Language Toolkit) for text mining and skill extraction to identify key skills and qualifications within job postings. Implemented K-means clustering algorithm to group similar job postings based on extracted skills, facilitating targeted job search and analysis for users.

projects.name: SMS Spam Classifier
projects.description: Created a software that uses NLP (Natural Language Processing) and Machine Learning for classifying a message as either spam or not-spam. Used Pythons Natural language toolkit (NLTK) library for data processing and cleaning, Scikit-learn for feature extraction. Used Naive Byes Algorithm for classification, successfully classifying the spam messages with 98% accuracy.

experiences.description: In-depth knowledge on key Machine Learning, deep learning topics and data preprocessing techniques from Amazon Scientists. Used libraries like Scikit-learn, TensorFlow and Keras to implement various machine learning and deep learning algorithms such as Artificial Neural Network. Platform to interact with Scientists and learn about break-through innovation.

Developed a Bidder Management System (BMS) using PHP and SQL, eliminating manual paperwork and automating processes for bidder data management. The software performs CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality, enabling authorized access to bidder information promoting data integrity and confidentiality. Implemented Agile methodologies to ensure efficient project delivery and collaborate effectively with team members to deliver high-quality software solutions on schedule.
